sentences.sContent: I left the camera and tripod in the rain and jumped in my vehicle until I had calmed down.
sentences.sContent_eng: I left the camera and tripod in the rain and jumped in my vehicle until I had calmed down.
sentences.sCn: 我只好将摄像机和三脚架留在雨中，跳进车内。 后来我才平静下来。

sentences.sContent: It is very important that you do not move your computer or tripod during the whole process.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is very important that you do not move your computer or tripod during the whole process.
sentences.sCn: 非常重要的是在整个过程中你千万不可移动电脑或三脚架。

trans.tranOther: a support with three legs, used for a piece of equipment, camera etc
